column4: HI! Computer A and computer B are in a LAN. Both computers have recycle bins - files are moved to them before deletion... User of computer A browses a directory of computer B (remotely) and then deletes some file X from it. Which recycle bin will it get into?

HI! Computer A and computer B are in a LAN. Both computers have recycle bins - files are moved to them before deletion... User of computer A browses a directory of computer B (remotely) and then deletes some file X from it. Which recycle bin will it get into?
